about_the_game:
Illustrations used in RUKIMIN's Disappointing Adventure !

■Terms
・Illustrations can be used freely by individuals, corporations, commercial and non-commercial people as long as they are within the scope of the agreement.
・You can use it in combination with other illustrations, or modify the color and shape.
・ No credit notation or prior notice is required.

■Prohibited matters
・ Use that is offensive to public order and morals
・ Use related to antisocial forces and illegal activities
・ Use for the purpose of accusation and accusation
・ The act of selling illustration materials as a collection of materials

■How to View
Right-click on "RUKIMIN's Disappointing Adventure!" under "Manage" in the Library section of the Steam menu, then select "Browse Local Files".
The files are contained in the "_Royalty free illustrations" folder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 403 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750 Ti | AMD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
